topic.title: TorrentFreak is behind the curve
topic.body:
https://torrentfreak.com/bitchute-is-a-bittorrent-powered-youtube-alternative-170129/

In this article they say that this BitChute is the first place of its kind, using webtorrent for a YouTube alternative.  They know about zeronet over there but I guess they haven't seen ZeroTube or KopyKate, not that either of them work terribly well at this point.  Oh yeah and there is IPFSTube too.

4_14UupgrdnT7Y8vMES7aqUFgD1fC5RYNrh8.body:
> [usdyi](#comment_10_16osdFmHgwgy9sgBws1po2zP5PxwMALvZa): 4787

What zite?

The most I've ever seen was 1000 or so.
